satellite.heading: Satellite
satellite.specs:
Zviyero: 50x58x64 mm
1P PocketQube
Kurema: 245 gr
Zvishandiso: aluminium, goridhe, fiberglass, uye zvemagetsi zvikamu.
Orbit: Altitude 525 ± 25 km; kurerekera: SSO 97.6 ± 0.1°
Launcher: PSLV (Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle) inoshanda neISRO

antenna.heading: Antenna/Sculpture
antenna.specs:
Zviyero: 6 m (dhayamita) uye 1.2m (kureba)
Kurema: 46 kg
Zvishandiso: aluminium, epoxy mirrored board, goridhe aruminiyamu dome yakamiswa kuburikidza nechikafu chimiro.

radio.heading: Radio Specs
radio.specs:
Downlink: 468.5 MHz
Modulation: CSS
Bandwidth: TBD
